lexUnit.name: respond.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: say something in reply or as a reaction.

sentence.text: ` That 's fine by me , " he responded a little gruffly .
Many sole practitioners responded angrily , seeing in the proposal for prior approval of their accounting systems a covert attempt to abolish sole practice ` through the back door " .
The brother who had given Rose away responded even more briefly and soon afterwards the priest left .
Relieved , perhaps , to have escaped the obstructionism of his officials in St Petersburg , the tsar responded favourably .
Freeing herself , Luce responded quietly , ` I 'm very sorry , Paul , but it is n't nonsense , and I do mean it . "
` It 's inconceivable , I agree , " responded Howard , waving a well-manicured hand , his plump face pink with embarrassment at the directness of Newman .
` Oh yes it is , " responded Mark .
` No , I do not agree with you , " responded another officer to the CEO .
` I 'm very glad that my books give you such pleasure , " responded Melissa with total sincerity .
` Yes , and I know Linda quite well , " responded Julia .
Dawson responded with , ` You did n't mind ? "
For example , when asked to explain what a shadow is , many young children responded with ` I do n't know " .
` I had just turned seven , " Alexei responded calmly .
` Unfortunately , in my experience the Germans are very bad at reading smoke signals , " Eisenhower responded caustically .
` One does not hasten such matters , " Jotan responded frostily .
` I 've been told more flattering things before , " he responded , semi-serious .
` Thank you , " he responded drily .
Palmer responded that the cut in vessel numbers was a positive move , but fell far short of the ban which remained the objective of the Pacific Island nations .
Nicholson responded that perhaps Corey had n't seen the poetry he was showing him .
He responded that he had never had any wish to see me anyway .
Blanche coughed and responded that the police were talking to everyone who had been at the farewell party on the sixth floor , including Parkin and Pargeter .
` If she did , it 'll be in the fridge , " responded Camille at the top of her voice .
Joe failed to respond this time .
